author: Hugh Hewitt
title: Opinion Trump hovers, but the number of his likely rivals keeps growing

sentence: Other tests of Trumps influence loom next week, including in Georgia, where polls show his preferred choice for governor, David Perdue, badly trailing incumbent Brian Kemp in the GOP primary.
author: Mariana Alfaro
title: Post Politics Now Senate primary in Pa. still unresolved as other tests of Trumps influence loom
